name: dogwalkers-api
description: zaledni del za 4. del lastnega projekta

scripts.mongo-import-users: docker cp ../app_database/persistent/users.json dw-dev-database:/users.json && docker exec -it dw-dev-database mongoimport --db dw-dev-cluster --collection Users --jsonArray --file users.json
scripts.mongo-import-oglasi: docker cp ../app_database/persistent/oglasi.json dw-dev-database:/oglasi.json && docker exec -it dw-dev-database mongoimport --db dw-dev-cluster --collection Oglasi --jsonArray --file oglasi.json
scripts.mongo-import: npm run mongo-import-users && npm run mongo-import-oglasi

author: Gasper Bozic, Gasper Stepec, Gasper Kolbezen, Matevz Vres, Grega Kranjec
